metadata.title: CVE-2021-45071 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) issue Odoo Community 15.0 and earlier and OdooEnterprise 15.0 and earlier, allows remote attackers to inject arbitraryweb script in the browser of a victim, via crafted uploaded file names.

criterions.comment: odoo package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
